				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-260c49d elementor-widget__width-auto elementor-widget elementor-widget-html" data-id="260c49d" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="html.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8" />
  <title>Ask AI Panel with Iframe</title>
  <style>
    html, body {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
      overflow-x: hidden;
    }

    #wrapper {
      position: relative;
    }

    #buttonContainer {
      text-align: right;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      z-index: 1;
    }

    #askAiButton {
      background-color: #188bcd;
      color: #ffffff;
      padding: 2px 10px;
      height: 38px;
      width: 100px;
      border: none;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-size: 16px;
      text-align: center;
      z-index: 2;
      display: inline-block;
      transition: background-color 0.3s;
    }

    #sidePanel {
      position: fixed;
      right: 0;
      top: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      width: 30vw;
      background-color: #ffffff;
      border: 1px solid #188bcd;
      border-bottom: none;
      box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
      border-radius: 8px 0 0 0;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      z-index: 10;
      transform: translateX(100%);
      transition: transform 0.3s ease, top 0.2s ease;
    }

    #sidePanel.positioned {
      top: var(--panel-top-offset, 0px);
    }

    #sidePanel.open {
      transform: translateX(0);
    }

    #closePanelBtn {
      position: absolute;
      top: 12px;
      right: 15px;
      background: none;
      border: none;
      font-size: 28px;
      cursor: pointer;
      color: #999;
      z-index: 1100;
      line-height: 1;
    }

    #iframeContainer {
      flex: 1;
      min-height: 0;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
    }

    #iframeContainer iframe {
      width: 100%;
      flex: 1;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 8px;
      min-height: 0;
    }

    div[data-elementor-type="footer"] {
      transition: margin-right 0.4s ease;
    }

    @media (min-width: 1920px) {
      #sidePanel {
        width: 28vw;
      }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1439px) and (min-width: 1024px) {
      #sidePanel {
        width: 35vw;
      }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1023px) {
      #askAiButton,
      #sidePanel {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <div id="wrapper">
    <div id="buttonContainer">
      <button id="askAiButton">Copilot</button>
    </div>

    <div id="sidePanel">
      <button id="closePanelBtn" aria-label="Close panel"></button>
      <div id="iframeContainer">
        <iframe id="docIframe" src="" title="Ask AI Panel"></iframe>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
      const askAiButton = document.getElementById('askAiButton');
      const sidePanel = document.getElementById('sidePanel');
      const closePanelBtn = document.getElementById('closePanelBtn');
      const docIframe = document.getElementById('docIframe');
      const footer = document.querySelector('footer[data-elementor-type="footer"]');

      let iframeLoaded = false;

      function isDesktopView() {
        return window.innerWidth >= 1024;
      }

      function getMainContentElement() {
        return (
          document.getElementById('main-content') ||
          document.querySelector('div[data-elementor-type="wp-page"]') ||
          document.querySelector('div[data-elementor-type="wp-post"]') ||
          document.querySelector('main') ||
          document.querySelector('.elementor')
        );
      }

      function isSectionActuallyHidden(section) {
        if (!section) return true;
        const style = window.getComputedStyle(section);
        return (
          style.display === 'none' ||
          style.visibility === 'hidden' ||
          style.opacity === '0' ||
          parseFloat(style.height) === 0 ||
          section.classList.contains('hidden-scroller')
        );
      }

      function getVisibleHeaderHeight() {
        const headerElement = document.querySelector('[data-elementor-type="header"]');
        if (!headerElement) return 0;


        const headerRect = headerElement.getBoundingClientRect();
        
        if (headerRect.bottom <= 0) return 0;
        if (headerRect.top < 0) {
          return Math.max(headerRect.bottom, 0);
        }
        
        return headerRect.height;
      }
      
    function calculateHeaderOffset() {
  const hiddenSection = document.querySelector('[data-id="86e3c21"]');
  const scrollPosition = window.scrollY;
  const isSectionHidden = isSectionActuallyHidden(hiddenSection);
  const stickyMenubar = document.querySelector('[data-id="4095b79"]');
  
  let baseOffset = 0;
  
  const isSafari = /^((?!chrome|android).)*safari/i.test(navigator.userAgent);
  
  if (scrollPosition >= 30 || isSectionHidden) {
    if (stickyMenubar && isSafari) {
      if (stickyMenubar.offsetHeight > 0) {
        baseOffset = stickyMenubar.offsetHeight;
      } else {
        const computedHeight = parseInt(window.getComputedStyle(stickyMenubar).height, 10);
        if (computedHeight > 0) {
          baseOffset = computedHeight;
        } else {
          baseOffset = 80;
        }
      }
    } else if (stickyMenubar && !isSafari) {
      const menubarRect = stickyMenubar.getBoundingClientRect();
      if (menubarRect.top <= 5 && menubarRect.height > 0) {
        baseOffset = menubarRect.height;
      }
    }
    
    if (baseOffset === 0) {
      baseOffset = getVisibleHeaderHeight();
      
      if (baseOffset === 0 && isSafari) {
        const potentialHeaders = [
          '[data-elementor-type="header"]',
          'header',
          '.header',
          '#header',
          '[class*="header"]',
          '[id*="header"]',
          '[class*="menu"]',
          '[id*="menu"]',
          '[class*="nav"]',
          '[id*="nav"]'
        ];
        
        for (const selector of potentialHeaders) {
          const elements = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
          
          for (const element of elements) {
            const rect = element.getBoundingClientRect();
            const style = window.getComputedStyle(element);
            
            if (rect.top >= -30 && rect.top <= 30 && 
                (rect.height > 0 || element.offsetHeight > 0) &&
                style.display !== 'none') {
              baseOffset = Math.max(rect.height, element.offsetHeight);
              break;
            }
          }
          
          if (baseOffset > 0) break;
        }
      }
    }
  } else {
    baseOffset = getVisibleHeaderHeight();
  }
  
  const buttonRect = askAiButton.getBoundingClientRect();
  const buttonBottom = buttonRect.bottom;
  
  let dynamicGap;
  if (isSafari) {
    dynamicGap = baseOffset;
  } else {
    if (buttonBottom > 45) {
      dynamicGap = baseOffset + 12;
    } else {
      dynamicGap = baseOffset + 6;
    }
  }
  
  return Math.max(dynamicGap, 0);
}

      function updatePanelPosition() {
        requestAnimationFrame(() => {
          const headerOffset = calculateHeaderOffset();
          
          sidePanel.classList.add('positioned');
          sidePanel.style.setProperty('--panel-top-offset', `${headerOffset}px`);
        });
      }


      function applyMarginShift(el) {
        if (!el || !isDesktopView()) return;
        
        let panelWidth = '30vw';
        if (window.innerWidth >= 1920) {
          panelWidth = '28vw';
        } else if (window.innerWidth <= 1439) {
          panelWidth = '35vw';
        }
        
        el.style.transition = 'margin-right 0.4s ease';
        el.style.marginRight = panelWidth;
      }
      
      function removeMarginShift(el) {
        if (!el) return;
        el.style.marginRight = '';
      }

      function openPanel() {
        if (!isDesktopView()) return;
        
        const mainContent = getMainContentElement();
        
        updatePanelPosition();
        
        setTimeout(() => {
          sidePanel.classList.add('open');
          
          if (!iframeLoaded) {
            docIframe.src = "https://copilot.robomq.io";
            iframeLoaded = true;
          }
        }, 10);
        
        applyMarginShift(mainContent);
        applyMarginShift(footer);


        sessionStorage.setItem('aiPanelOpen', 'true');
      }

      function closePanel() {
        sidePanel.classList.remove('open');
        sessionStorage.setItem('aiPanelOpen', 'false');

        const mainContent = getMainContentElement();
        removeMarginShift(mainContent);
        removeMarginShift(footer);
      }

      askAiButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
        if (sidePanel.classList.contains('open')) {
          closePanel();
        } else {
          openPanel();
        }
      });

      closePanelBtn.addEventListener('click', closePanel);

      window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
        if (sidePanel.classList.contains('open') && isDesktopView()) {
          updatePanelPosition();
        }
      });

      window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
        const mainContent = getMainContentElement();
        
        if (!isDesktopView()) {
          removeMarginShift(mainContent);
          removeMarginShift(footer);
        } else {
          if (sessionStorage.getItem('aiPanelOpen') === 'true') {
            updatePanelPosition();
            applyMarginShift(mainContent);
            applyMarginShift(footer);
          }
        }
      });

      if (sessionStorage.getItem('aiPanelOpen') === 'true' && isDesktopView()) {
        openPanel();
      }

      window.addEventListener('beforeunload', () => {
        const isOpen = sidePanel.classList.contains('open');
        sessionStorage.setItem('aiPanelOpen', isOpen ? 'true' : 'false');
      });
    });
  </script>

      font-size: 36px;
      line-height: 43.2px;
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 767px) {
    #day-based-heading {
      text-align: center;
      font-size: 24px;
      line-height: 28.8px;
    }
  }

  /*  Force H1 inside to inherit parent styling (no color / font override) */
  #day-based-heading h1 {
    all: inherit;
    display: inline; /* removes default block behavior and margin */
  }
</style>

<script>
(function(){
  try {
    var container = document.getElementById('day-based-heading');
    if (!container) return;

    var headingA = container.getAttribute('data-heading-a') || "Heading A";
    var headingB = container.getAttribute('data-heading-b') || "Heading B";

    var daysB = (container.getAttribute('data-days-a') || "1,3,5")
      .split(',')
      .map(function(s){ return parseInt(s,10); })
      .filter(function(n){ return !isNaN(n) && n>=0 && n<=6; });

    var today = new Date().getDay();
    var useB = daysB.indexOf(today) !== -1;

    var finalText = useB ? headingB : headingA;
    container.innerHTML = '<h1>' + finalText + '</h1>';

    container.classList.add('day-heading--loaded');
  } catch (e) {
    console && console.warn && console.warn('day heading script error', e);
  }
})();
</script>				</div>

				<script type="text/javascript">
				(function() {
					// Global page view and session tracking for UAEL Modal Popup feature
					try {
						// Session tracking: increment if this is a new session
						
						// Check if any popup on this page uses current page tracking
						var hasCurrentPageTracking = false;
						var currentPagePopups = [];
						// Check all modal popups on this page for current page tracking
						if (typeof jQuery !== 'undefined') {
							jQuery('.uael-modal-parent-wrapper').each(function() {
								var scope = jQuery(this).data('page-views-scope');
								var enabled = jQuery(this).data('page-views-enabled');
								var popupId = jQuery(this).attr('id').replace('-overlay', '');	
								if (enabled === 'yes' && scope === 'current') {
									hasCurrentPageTracking = true;
									currentPagePopups.push(popupId);
								}
							});
						}
						// Global tracking: ALWAYS increment if ANY popup on the site uses global tracking
												// Current page tracking: increment per-page counters
						if (hasCurrentPageTracking && currentPagePopups.length > 0) {
							var currentUrl = window.location.href;
							var urlKey = 'uael_page_views_' + btoa(currentUrl).replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/g, '').substring(0, 50);
							var currentPageViews = parseInt(localStorage.getItem(urlKey) || '0');
							currentPageViews++;
							localStorage.setItem(urlKey, currentPageViews.toString());
							// Store URL mapping for each popup
							for (var i = 0; i < currentPagePopups.length; i++) {
								var popupUrlKey = 'uael_popup_' + currentPagePopups[i] + '_url_key';
								localStorage.setItem(popupUrlKey, urlKey);
							}
						}
					} catch (e) {
						// Silently fail if localStorage is not available
					}
				})();
				</script>
				    <script>
        let iframeUpdated = false;
        let preloadedForms = {}; // Store preloaded forms

        document.querySelectorAll('.uael-trigger').forEach(function(button) {
            button.addEventListener('mouseenter', preloadForm);
            button.addEventListener('click', handleClick);
        });

        function preloadForm(event) {
            const button = event.target;
// 			console.log(`button: ${button}`);
            const fourthParent = button.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement;
            const fourthParentId = fourthParent.id;
// 			console.log(`fourthParentId: ${fourthParentId}`);

            // If the form is already preloaded, skip loading again
            if (preloadedForms[fourthParentId]) return;

            const modal = findModal(fourthParentId);
// 			console.log(`modal: ${modal}`);
            if (!modal) return;

            const formDiv = modal.querySelector('[data-form-id]');
// 			console.log(`formDiv: ${formDiv}`);
            if (!formDiv) return;

            const formId = formDiv.getAttribute('data-form-id');
// 			console.log(`formId: ${formId}`);
            const targetSelector = `.target-common-hubspot-class [class="${fourthParentId}"] [data-form-id='${formId}'] div`;
// 			console.log(`targetSelector: ${targetSelector}`);

            // Check if the form is a discovery-call-h2r type and load the iframe
            if (formId === "discovery-call-h2r" || formId === "discovery-call-h2r-setup-a-time-to-talk"||formId === "discovery-call-h2r-tablet") {
// 				console.log(`condition 1 true`);
                addIframeToDiv(modal, fourthParentId, formId); // Pass fourthParentId and formId
            } else {
// 				console.log(`condition 2 true`);
                loadHubSpotFormScript(formId, targetSelector, fourthParent.classList.contains("OnSubmit-PlayVideo"));
// 				console.log(`loadHubSpotFormScript completed`);
            }
            preloadedForms[fourthParentId] = true;
        }

        function handleClick(event) {
            const button = event.target;
            const fourthParent = button.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement;
            const fourthParentId = fourthParent.id;
            const modal = findModal(fourthParentId);

            if (!modal) return;

            // If the form is discovery-call-h2r, ensure the iframe is added
            const formDiv = modal.querySelector('[data-form-id]');
            const formId = formDiv.getAttribute('data-form-id');
            if (formDiv && (formId === "discovery-call-h2r" || formId === "discovery-call-h2r-setup-a-time-to-talk"|| formId === "discovery-call-h2r-tablet")) {
                addIframeToDiv(modal, fourthParentId, formId); // Pass fourthParentId and formId
            } else {
                openModal(modal);
            }
        }

        function findModal(fourthParentId) {
            return Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.target-common-hubspot-class')).find(modal => {
                return modal.querySelector(`[class="${fourthParentId}"]`);
            });
        }

        function openModal(modal) {
            modal.style.display = 'block';
        }

        function waitForIframeAndUpdateId() {
// 			console.log(`inside waitForIframeAndUpdateId`);
            if (iframeUpdated) return;
// 			console.log(`iframeUpdated continues`);
            const interval = 50;
            const maxAttempts = 15;
            let attempts = 0;

            const intervalId = setInterval(() => {
                const iframe = document.querySelector('#hs-form-iframe-0');
                attempts++;

                if (iframe) {
                    iframe.id = 'hs-form-iframe-20';
                    iframeUpdated = true;
                    clearInterval(intervalId);
                }

                if (attempts >= maxAttempts) {
                    clearInterval(intervalId);
                }
            }, interval);
        }

        function loadHubSpotFormScript(formId, targetSelector, hasPlayVideoClass) {
            var script = document.createElement('script');
			console.log(`script: ${script}`);
            script.innerHTML = `
                window.hsFormsOnReady = window.hsFormsOnReady || [];
                window.hsFormsOnReady.push(() => {
                    hbspt.forms.create({
                        region: "na1",
                        portalId: "3854161",
                        formId: "${formId}",
                        target: \`${targetSelector}\`,
                        ${hasPlayVideoClass ? `
                        onFormSubmitted: function($form) {
                            window.open('https://vimeo.com/938341264', '_blank');
                        }` : ''}
                    });
                    waitForIframeAndUpdateId();
                });
            `;
            document.head.appendChild(script);
// 			console.log(`document.head.appendChild(script) completed`);
        }

        function addIframeToDiv(modal, fourthParentId, formId) {
            //const iframeId = 'iframe-discovery-call-h2r';
//             console.log(`inside addIframeToDiv`);
			let iframeId;
            if (formId === "discovery-call-h2r") {
                iframeId = 'iframe-discovery-call-h2r';
// 				console.log(`iframeId: ${iframeId}`);
            } 
			else if(formId === "discovery-call-h2r-tablet"){
                iframeId = 'iframe-discovery-call-h2r-tablet';
// 				console.log(`iframeId: ${iframeId}`);
            }
			else {
                iframeId = 'iframe-discovery-call-h2r-small';
// 				console.log(`iframeId: ${iframeId}`);
            }
            // Check if the iframe with the specific ID already exists
            const existingIframe = document.querySelector(`#${iframeId}`);
            if (existingIframe) return; // Don't create a new iframe if one already exists

            // Define the target selector
            const targetSelector = `.target-common-hubspot-class [class="${fourthParentId}"] [data-form-id='${formId}'] div`;
// 			console.log(`targetSelector: ${targetSelector}`);

            // Get the target element
            const targetElement = document.querySelector(targetSelector);
// 			console.log(`targetElement: ${targetElement}`);
            if (targetElement) {
                // Create the iframe
                var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
                iframe.id = iframeId; // Assign the ID to the iframe
                iframe.src = "https://meetings.hubspot.com/bramh-gupta/discovery-call-robomq-hire2retire?embed=true";
                iframe.width = "100%";  // Adjust width as needed
                iframe.height = "750vh";  // Adjust height as needed
                iframe.frameBorder = "0";  // Remove border
                iframe.style.border = "none"; // Remove any border styling
                iframe.style.position = "absolute"; // Position iframe to fill the parent div
                iframe.style.top = "0"; // Align iframe to the top
                iframe.style.left = "0"; // Align iframe to the left

                // If a modal or a parent container exists, set its position
                if (modal) {
// 					console.log(`setting modal position to relative`);
                    modal.style.position = "relative"; // Ensure the modal is relative for absolute positioning of iframe
                }

                // Append the iframe to the target element
                targetElement.appendChild(iframe);
// 				console.log(`appending iframe to target element`);
            } else {
                console.error("Target element not found.");
            }
        }
    </script>

				<script>
				const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
			</script>
